FIELD.NAME: HEADER-VERSION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Version Number for this message description.

FIELD.NAME: MESSAGE-TYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Message type identifier: REQ, RESP, or MSG

FIELD.NAME: MESSAGE-SUBTYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Unique message identifier, fixed for GMSEC Standard Messages

FIELD.NAME: CONTENT-VERSION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Version Number for this message content description

FIELD.NAME: MSG-ID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Unique ID used by the Requestor and the Publisher to distinguish the message

FIELD.NAME: C2CX-SUBTYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Identifies the type of information being transferred between the Components

FIELD.NAME: CNTL-KEYWORD
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Keyword extracted from the CNTL-STRING. Useful for routing/processing.

FIELD.NAME: CNTL-STRING
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Parameters to guide the component on further processing. E.g., INIT, Stop, Shutdown, Restart, Do X, Y, and Z.

FIELD.NAME: SPECIAL-INFO
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: For application use. Any additional information can be provided here.
